summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackClarins Super Restorative Day Moisturizer is an anti-aging day cream for mature skin visibly minimizes lines, wrinkles and slackening while evening skin tone. Powered by Organic Harungana, as effective as retinol* and gentle on the skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsVisibly minimizes lines, wrinkles, loss of density + skin slackeningVisibly lifts, firms, smoothes + plumpsHydrates, comforts + softensHelps even skin toneKey IngredientsOrganic Harungana Extract: as effective as retinol* and gentle on the skin; visibly minimizes wrinkles and loss of densityOrganic Desert Date Extract + a Vitamin C Derivative: promote an even skin tone.Organic Sea Lily Extract: intensely hydrates to leave skin feeling soft and comfortableVegetal Squalane Extract: helps protect and reinforce the skin's hydrolipidic film to shield it from external aggressorsPlant-Based Anti-Pollution Complex: helps protect skin from indoor and outdoor pollution, including blue light from electronicsOrganic Gorse Extract: takes on skin slackening at the source*In vitro test on collagen synthesis.Research Results88% visibly plumper skin*85% visibly firmer & replenished skin**Consumer test - Super Restorative Day Cream, all skin types, 111 women - 28 days.Item 2598903How To UseCLARINS EXCLUSIVE DRAINING PRESSURE APPLICATION METHODSmooth over clean face and neck each morning.Apply with gentle press-and-release movements, avoiding the eye contour area.Work downward, over neck and décolleté.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau. Cetearyl Isononanoate. Dicaprylyl Carbonate. Glycerin. Cetearyl Alcohol. Propanediol. Ascorbyl Glucoside. Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter. Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides. Dimethicone. Glyceryl Stearate. Peg-100 Stearate. Cetearyl Glucoside. Butylene Glycol. Carbomer. Glyceryl Caprylate. Sodium Hydroxide. Parfum/Fragrance. Xylitylglucoside. Hydroxyacetophenone. Sodium Citrate. Anhydroxylitol. Xanthan Gum. Tocopheryl Acetate. Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride. Xylitol. Disodium Edta. Alcohol. Sodium Lactate. Glucose. Citric Acid. Harungana Madagascariensis Extract. Marrubium Vulgare Extract. Coco-Glucoside. Balanites Roxburghii Seed Oil. Phenethyl Alcohol. Furcellaria Lumbricalis Extract. Pancratium Maritimum Extract. Pyrus Sorbus Bud Extract. Ulex Europaeus Leaf/Root/Stem Extract. Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1. Lapsana Communis Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract. Maris Sal/Sea Salt/Sel Marin. CI 14700/Red 4. Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7 [V3994A].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: CLARINS EXCLUSIVE DRAINING PRESSURE APPLICATION METHODSmooth over clean face and neck each morning.Apply with gentle press-and-release movements, avoiding the eye contour area.Work downward, over neck and décolleté.
ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau. Cetearyl Isononanoate. Dicaprylyl Carbonate. Glycerin. Cetearyl Alcohol. Propanediol. Ascorbyl Glucoside. Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter. Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides. Dimethicone. Glyceryl Stearate. Peg-100 Stearate. Cetearyl Glucoside. Butylene Glycol. Carbomer. Glyceryl Caprylate. Sodium Hydroxide. Parfum/Fragrance. Xylitylglucoside. Hydroxyacetophenone. Sodium Citrate. Anhydroxylitol. Xanthan Gum. Tocopheryl Acetate. Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride. Xylitol. Disodium Edta. Alcohol. Sodium Lactate. Glucose. Citric Acid. Harungana Madagascariensis Extract. Marrubium Vulgare Extract. Coco-Glucoside. Balanites Roxburghii Seed Oil. Phenethyl Alcohol. Furcellaria Lumbricalis Extract. reviews.headline: Great daily moisturizer for mature skin!
reviews.comments: I have very sensitive skin and dry. This moisturizer is light enough not to irritate and rich enough to hydrate my dry skin.

reviews.headline: This moisturizer is a game changer
reviews.comments: The price tag is a whopper but this moisturizer is the best I have ever had.

reviews.headline: recommended by the salesperson
reviews.comments: don't buy if your skin is sensitive! it burns every time i use it, and i've been using it for a little over a month. just be cautious. it does make my skin look and feel beautiful AFTER the stinging.

reviews.headline: I would keep using this product!
reviews.comments: My skin looks and feels so much better!

faceoff_positive.comments: I have been using Super Restorative Day Cream for many years. It moisturizes without being greasy. Once it is massaged in you forget that it is there.
faceoff_positive.headline: Super Restorative Day Cream

faceoff_negative.comments: "I really like the Clarins products! As an Asian individual who drinks plenty of water and maintains a balanced diet, I'm excited to see how these products enhance my skin. I look forward to experiencing noticeable improvements soon."
faceoff_negative.headline: Waiting on my results!
